archimate:ArchimateModel.name: DVS TOGAF ADM verwaltungsübergreifende Gesamtarchitektur
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
Repository auf github veröffentlicht in öffentlichem Space: https://github.com/swiss/dps-architecture-work-group Lizenz Apache2: https://github.com/swiss/dps-architecture-work-group/blob/main/LICENSE The models are built by the working group or derived from open documentations, binding standards are the publications not the models e.g. https://www.ech.ch/de/ech/ech-0279/1.0.0
Remember, all models are wrong but some are useful (https://www.linkedin.com/posts/ghohpe_the-secret-to-software-architecture-is-knowing-activity-7401255011059625984-_fv0/ https://archive.learnwardleymapping.com/book.html)
